author: Sophie Gallagher, Sophie Gallagher
title: This is why the coronavirus bill will hit women hardest according to experts
description: 'Though significantly more men than women appear to be fatalities of the virus in the UK, there are specific concerns for women in the bill,' says the Women's Budget Group
content:
The government has passed new emergency powers, known as the Coronavirus Act 2020, aimed at helping ministers deal with the ongoing Covid-19 outbreak across the country.
The measures were drafted in record time and passed in both the House of Commons and Hou… [+7878 chars]
